analyzed: grang bas nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba skyob par 'dod pa'o //
translated: and those who are afflicted by cold desire protection from the cold,

original: de'i phyir skyob par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyob par 'dod pa'o //
translated: therefore they desire protection.

original: de bzhin du bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, they desire protection from hunger, thirst, and so on.

original: skyob pa @259a * //
analyzed: skyob pa @259a * //
translated: Protection

original: ni gdugs dang / snam bu dang / zas dang / skom la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ni gdugs dang / snam bu dang / zas dang / skom la sogs pa'o //
translated: is an umbrella, a shawl, food, drink, and so on.

original: de ltar bsam zhing don gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsam zhing don gyis shig pa'o //
translated: You should think in this way and act accordingly.üîΩYou should be a friend for those who desire a friend.

original: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no //üîΩzhes pa ni pha rol po'i snga rab tu gnyen te /
analyzed: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no // zhes pa ni pha rol po'i snga rab tu gnyen te /
translated: Those who desire a friend are those who seek a companion.

original: bdag sde dang dpung rab tu tshol ba'i dpung gnyen no //
analyzed: bdag sde dang dpung rab tu tshol ba'i dpung gnyen no //
translated: You should be a friend who seeks an army and an army that seeks a companion.

original: de ltar sdug bsngal ba mthong nas de'i dpung dang gnyen byed pa ni dpung gnyen no //
analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal ba mthong nas de'i dpung dang gnyen byed pa ni dpung gnyen no //
translated: Thus, having seen that he is suffering, he becomes his ally and protector.

original: gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo zhes pa ni gang dga' bab chu'am chu bo'am /
analyzed: gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo zhes pa ni gang dga' bab chu'am chu bo'am /
translated: He is the island for those who desire an island.

original: mtsho rnams kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus na rten du gyur pa'i sa'am thang lta bu'i gling zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtsho rnams kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus na rten du gyur pa'i sa'am thang lta bu'i gling zhes bya'o //
translated: An island is a piece of land surrounded on all sides by water, a river, or a lake, which serves as a support in the middle.

original: gang dag 'bab chu la sogs pas khyer te gong ma lta bu dang phrad par sems la smon pa ni gling 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gang dag 'bab chu la sogs pas khyer te gong ma lta bu dang phrad par sems la smon pa ni gling 'dod pa'o //
translated: Those who desire an island are those who wish to reach such a place, being carried away by a river, etc.

original: bdag de ltar gyur par byed cing don byed pa ni gling ngo //
analyzed: bdag de ltar gyur par byed cing don byed pa ni gling ngo //
translated: He is the island because he acts for the sake of those who are in such a situation.

original: 'khras bla na med pa 'dod pa rnams kyi 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes pa /
analyzed: 'khras bla na med pa 'dod pa rnams kyi 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes pa /
translated: He is the supreme refuge for those who desire the supreme refuge.

original: 'khras zhes pa ni gang dag gcan gzan la sogs pas rab tu nyen pa na shing dang brag la sogs pa ni 'khra sa'o //
analyzed: 'khras zhes pa ni gang dag gcan gzan la sogs pas rab tu nyen pa na shing dang brag la sogs pa ni 'khra sa'o //
translated: A refuge is a tree, a rock, etc., to which one clings when in danger from wild beasts, etc.

original: bla na med pa ni bdud dang ngan 'gros nyen pa la sogs pa gtan du gab pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: bla na med pa ni bdud dang ngan 'gros nyen pa la sogs pa gtan du gab pa'i gnas so //
translated: The supreme refuge is the eternal shelter for those in danger from Mara, the lower realms, etc.

original: de bas na 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de bas na 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes so //
translated: Therefore, it is the unexcelled raft.üîΩIt is the ship for those who wish to cross to the other shore of the ocean of existence.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyi gru'o zhes bya ba ni de la srid pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa rnams ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas na mtsho'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams kyi gru'o zhes bya ba ni de la srid pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa rnams ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas na mtsho'o //
translated: The ocean is like the ocean because of desire, form, and formlessness.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rab tu rgal dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu rgal dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is very difficult to cross.

original: zab pa dang rgya che ba dang / dba' klong dang / mi ma yin pa dang / chu srin la sogs pa rab tu mang bas na /
analyzed: zab pa dang rgya che ba dang / dba' klong dang / mi ma yin pa dang / chu srin la sogs pa rab tu mang bas na /
translated: It is very deep, vast, and full of whirlpools, non-humans, crocodiles, and so on.

original: yang rab tu rgal dka' ba'o //
analyzed: yang rab tu rgal dka' ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is very difficult to cross.

original: de bzhin du srid pa yang shin tu rgal dka' ba ste thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags mthug po dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu che ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rab tu mang ba la sogs pa srid pa ni rab tu rgal dka' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du srid pa yang shin tu rgal dka' ba ste thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags mthug po dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu che ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rab tu mang ba la sogs pa srid pa ni rab tu rgal dka' zhes bya'o //
translated: Similarly, existence is very difficult to cross, because of the thick latent tendencies accumulated since beginningless time, the great afflictions, the multitude of evil friends, and so on. Existence is said to be very difficult to cross.

original: de'i pha rol ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de'i pha rol ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The other shore of that is nirvana.

original: 'gro bar 'dod pa ni srid pa'i nyes dmigs shes shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar 'dod pa ni srid pa'i nyes dmigs shes shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan shes pa'o //
translated: The desire to go is the knowledge of the faults of cyclic existence and the knowledge of the virtues of nirvana.

original: de skad du yang /üîΩ'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las //
analyzed: de skad du yang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las //
translated: And so it is said:üîΩWith the intention of liberating

original: 'grol bar 'gyur pa'i bsam pa can //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'grol bar 'gyur pa'i bsam pa can // zhes gsungs so //
translated: from the fearful ocean of cyclic existence,üîΩThe great king of medicines that cures all diseasesüîΩis the boat for crossing over.

original: gru bo zhes bya ba ni de las sgrol ba'i thabs te /
analyzed: gru bo zhes bya ba ni de las sgrol ba'i thabs te /
translated: The boat for crossing over is the method for liberation from that.

original: gzings la sogs pa lta bu'i zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzings la sogs pa lta bu'i zhes pa'o //
translated: It is like a ship and so forth.üîΩThe great king of medicines that cures all diseases

original: nad thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po @259b chen po zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nad thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po @259b chen po zhes pa ni /
translated: is the boat for crossing over.

original: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nad thams cad do //
analyzed: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas nad thams cad do //
translated: Disease is also all, and so it is all diseases.

original: sel ba ni zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sel ba ni zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: Curing is pacifying.

original: gang gis she na sman pa'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: gang gis she na sman pa'i rgyal po ste /
translated: By what? The king of physicians.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Buddha, the Bhagavan.

original: des phyi dang nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: des phyi dang nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //
translated: He pacifies all outer and inner diseases.

original: zug rdu phra mo yang ma lus par 'joms pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zug rdu phra mo yang ma lus par 'joms pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Because he completely destroys even the smallest pain, it is called that.

original: blang pa dang dor ba'i dngos po'i bye brag phyed pas shes rab nyid do zhes pa ni /
analyzed: blang pa dang dor ba'i dngos po'i bye brag phyed pas shes rab nyid do zhes pa ni /
translated: It is wisdom itself, since it distinguishes the particulars of what is to be adopted and what is to be rejected.

original: blang ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: blang ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be adopted is what is to be accomplished.

original: dor ba ni spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: dor ba ni spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be rejected is what is to be abandoned.

original: dngos po zhes pa ni don byed nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po zhes pa ni don byed nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term entity refers to what is able to perform a function.

original: gzhan du na dngos po gsum ni srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po gsum ni srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, since three entities are possible,

original: bye brag phyed ni khyad par zhes pa'o ;
analyzed: bye brag phyed ni khyad par zhes pa'o ;
translated: distinguishing is a particular.

original: / shes rab ni chos rnams la khyad par dang bye brag shes par byed pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: / shes rab ni chos rnams la khyad par dang bye brag shes par byed pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: Wisdom is the wisdom that causes one to know the particulars and distinctions of phenomena.üîΩIt is the light of gnosis that dispels the darkness of all bad views.

original: lta ba ngan pa'i mun nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o zhes pa ni lta ba ngan pa zhes pa ni shes rab phyin ci log pa ste /
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa'i mun nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o zhes pa ni lta ba ngan pa zhes pa ni shes rab phyin ci log pa ste /
translated: Bad views are the opposite of wisdom.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don la rmongs pas 'jig rten pha rol med ces smra ba'o ;
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don la rmongs pas 'jig rten pha rol med ces smra ba'o ;
translated: Since one is confused about the meaning of cause and effect, one says that there is no world beyond.

original: / de nyid mun pa dang 'dra bas na mun nag go //
analyzed: / de nyid mun pa dang 'dra bas na mun nag go //
translated: Since that itself is like darkness, it is darkness.

original: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi phyin ci log bsal nas rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / sku dang ye shes kyis sems can gyi don byed pa ni ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi phyin ci log bsal nas rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / sku dang ye shes kyis sems can gyi don byed pa ni ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Having dispelled error through right wisdom, one acts for the sake of sentient beings through cause, effect, body, and intuition. This is called the appearance of intuition.

original: des ci byed ce na /
analyzed: des ci byed ce na /
translated: What does it do?üîΩIt is the wish-granting gem which fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings just as they desire.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes pa ni sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes pa ni sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can thams cad do //
translated: Sentient beings are all sentient beings.

original: sems ni yid do //
analyzed: sems ni yid do //
translated: Mind is thought.

original: bsam pa ni re ba smon pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ni re ba smon pa'o //
translated: Wishes are hopes and aspirations.

original: ji lta ba bzhin re ba ni ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin re ba ni ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Just as they desire is just as they are.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa ni bsam pa mthar phyin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa ni bsam pa mthar phyin par byed pa'o //
translated: Fulfilling is bringing about the fulfillment of wishes.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes pa ni nor bu khyad par can gyis sems can kun gyi yid la bsams pa'i don sbyin par nus pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes pa ni nor bu khyad par can gyis sems can kun gyi yid la bsams pa'i don sbyin par nus pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The wish-granting gem is the special gem which is able to grant the fulfillment of the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po ltar sems can kun gyi don byed ces pa'o ;
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po ltar sems can kun gyi don byed ces pa'o ;
translated: As illustrated by that, it is the one that acts for the welfare of all sentient beings, like a wish-fulfilling tree and an excellent vase.

original: /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku thob par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes pa ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku thob par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes pa ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The wisdom of omniscience is for the sake of attaining the body of the wisdom being Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: sku ni ye shes kyi sku rang byung ngo //
analyzed: sku ni ye shes kyi sku rang byung ngo //
translated: The body is the body of wisdom, self-arisen.

original: thob pa ni rtogs par 'gyur pa'o //üîΩthams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni dngos @260a * //
analyzed: thob pa ni rtogs par 'gyur pa'o // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni dngos @260a * //
translated: Attainment is realization.

original: po ma lus pa ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: po ma lus pa ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of omniscience is the knowledge of all things without exception just as they are.

original: de bas na ye shes kyi sku de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yum yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ye shes kyi sku de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i yum yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is taught that that body of wisdom is the mother of omniscience.

original: gzhan gyi yum ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi yum ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the mother of others?

original: spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: The five eyes are for the sake of attainment.

original: ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa ni spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan no //
analyzed: ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa ni spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / shes rab kyi spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan no //
translated: The vision of pristine awareness is completely pure. The five eyes are the fleshly eye, the divine eye, the eye of wisdom, the eye of Dharma, and the eye of a buddha.

original: thob par bya ba zhes pa ni de rnams dang ldan par bya dgos pa'o //
analyzed: thob par bya ba zhes pa ni de rnams dang ldan par bya dgos pa'o //
translated: One should attain them.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The vision of pristine awareness is completely pure.

original: ye shes ni sngar bshad ma thag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes ni sngar bshad ma thag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Pristine awareness is the omniscience that was just explained.

original: ye shes kyi sku rab tu blta dka' ba yang gzigs pas na yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku rab tu blta dka' ba yang gzigs pas na yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Since the vision of the body of pristine awareness, which is very difficult to see, is also seen, it is completely pure.

original: spyan lnga po gang la rab rib mi mnga' ba gsal ba'i bdag nyid yod pa gang yin pa'i ni ye shes kyi'o zhes pa yang ngo //
analyzed: spyan lnga po gang la rab rib mi mnga' ba gsal ba'i bdag nyid yod pa gang yin pa'i ni ye shes kyi'o zhes pa yang ngo //
translated: The vision of the five eyes, which has the nature of clarity, free of cataracts, is that of pristine awareness.

original: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa gtang ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes pa ni //
analyzed: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa gtang ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes pa ni //
translated: In order to give the gifts of material things, fearlessness, and the Dharma, the six perfections are completely perfected.

original: zang zing ni nor dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zang zing ni nor dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: Material things are wealth, fruits, and so on.

original: mi 'jigs pa ni skyabs byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa ni skyabs byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Fearlessness is protection, and so on.

original: chos ni ram par dkar bas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni ram par dkar bas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the benefit of beings through pure deeds.

original: sbyin pa ni gzhan la phan par 'dod nas mi 'jigs par gtong ba'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni gzhan la phan par 'dod nas mi 'jigs par gtong ba'o //
translated: Giving is the fearless bestowal of gifts out of a desire to benefit others.

original: 'dir dngos po gsum yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ji ltar rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir dngos po gsum yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ji ltar rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Here, how are the five perfections of giving completed through the complete giving of the three things?üîΩThrough the five, one benefits beings with material things.üîΩThrough morality, one benefits them with protection.

original: 'di lngar zang zing gis sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang skyabs kyis ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos kyis ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'di lngar zang zing gis sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang skyabs kyis ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos kyis ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: Through the Dharma, one benefits them with the morality of gathering virtuous dharmas.

original: de'i dus na bya ba gzhan la mi 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: de'i dus na bya ba gzhan la mi 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: At that time, not engaging in other activities is effort.

original: sems g-yeng pa gzhan mi sems pa ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: sems g-yeng pa gzhan mi sems pa ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Not thinking of other distractions is patience.

original: rtse gcig tu gnas pa ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rtse gcig tu gnas pa ni bsam gtan no //
translated: Abiding one-pointedly is concentration.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes pa ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes pa ni shes rab bo //
translated: Knowing their nature is wisdom.

original: de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the six perfections are completed.üîΩThe attainment of the ten stages is due to the completion of the stores of merit and intuition, and of meditative concentration.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa bcu thob pa'o zhes pa ni bsod nams ni gang byas na dge bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa bcu thob pa'o zhes pa ni bsod nams ni gang byas na dge bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Merit is that by which one becomes virtuous.

original: ye shes ni gang byas na grol bar 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni gang byas na grol bar 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Intuition is that by which one becomes liberated.

original: tshogs ni bde ba mchog tu 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs ni bde ba mchog tu 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The stores are the means to supreme bliss.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni blo mnyam par 'jog pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni blo mnyam par 'jog pa ste /
translated: Meditative concentration is the equipoise of the mind.

original: 'di ltar lus drang por bsrang ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar lus drang por bsrang ste /
translated: Thus, one should straighten the body.

original: sngar @260b bshad pa'i 'khor lo drug po lus la bsam par byas nas aa las skyes pa'i ral gri aas mtshan pa 'bar bas sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa snying ga'i rtog pa bcad nas rdo rje chos kyi lam dang / rdo rje zab mo'i lam nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsis sku gsum gyi gsang ba'i rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang bas sa bcu thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur pa snga phyi'i gdams ngag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar @260b bshad pa'i 'khor lo drug po lus la bsam par byas nas aa las skyes pa'i ral gri aas mtshan pa 'bar bas sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa snying ga'i rtog pa bcad nas rdo rje chos kyi lam dang / rdo rje zab mo'i lam nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsis sku gsum gyi gsang ba'i rtsa nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang bas sa bcu thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur pa snga phyi'i gdams ngag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand from the earlier and later instructions that one attains the ten stages and perfects the perfections.

original: de ltar dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the stages of the rite of empowerment in that way,

original: da ni gnyis med kyi ye shes de kho na nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gnyis med kyi ye shes de kho na nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to clearly demonstrate the suchness of nondual exalted wisdom,

original: chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do zhes pa ni /
analyzed: chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do zhes pa ni /
